meta.title: Bentley Systems | Infrastructure Engineering Software

meta.name: description
meta.content: Providing architects, engineers, constructors, and owner-operators with comprehensive architecture and engineering solutions for advancing infrastructure.
Bentley Systems | Infrastructure Engineering Software Company
Providing architects, engineers, constructors, and owner-operators with comprehensive architecture and engineering solutions for advancing infrastructure.

meta.content: Providing architects, engineers, constructors, and owner-operators with comprehensive architecture and engineering solutions for advancing infrastructure.

div.h2: Engineering Software For Your Entire Journey

section.class: elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-62261ef elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default

elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-03bee53 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-min-height elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-height-default

img.alt: black icon with construction crane over top, two buildings below, varying in height and width, representing different sized businesses, firms and organizations would be a good match for Bentley's software

black icon with construction crane over top, two buildings below, varying in height and width, representing different sized businesses, firms and organizations would be a good match for Bentley's software

div.h3:
No Project Is Too
Big or Small

div.p: Trusted by professionals and organizations of all sizes, on any project scale.

section.class: elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-32c9fdb elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-min-height elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-height-default

img.alt: black icon seamless workflows three people in a circle with lines between them representing that they are working together seamlessly
black icon seamless workflows three people in a circle with lines between them representing that they are working together seamlessly

div.p: Seamless collaboration across all stages of infrastructure development.

section.class: elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-8f40f8a elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-min-height elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-height-default

img.alt: black icon hand holding engineering gear
black icon hand holding engineering gear

div.p: Exceptional support and training with our software, 24/7.

section.class: elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-8e1727a elementor-section-height-min-height elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-items-middle

elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-030204f elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default

div.h4: When you need to deliver a project with confidence, you can count on Bentley.

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-9e3b5c8 premium-flip-style-fade elementor-widget__width-inherit elementor-widget elementor-widget-premium-addon-flip-box

span.span: Confidently plan, design, build, operate, and maintain smart and resilient water and wastewater systems.

p.span: Helping the world transition to cleaner energy sources amid global industrial growth and changing energy needs.

section.class: elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-5d11ebd elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-content-top elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default
elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-65c181b elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default

p.span: Connect the physical and virtual world to better plan, design, construct and operate road networks.
Enhance system safety, supply chain communication, and asset performance.
Empower rail decision-making with data for service, safety, and reliability.
Gain the visibility and insight needed to improve decision-making and business outcomes.

section.class: elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-1d08c73 elementor-section-full_width engineering-firms elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default

div.h2: We Know Infrastructure Isn't One Size Fits All

div.p: Leverage our digital solutions to connect and streamline how your firm designs, builds, and delivers infrastructure.

div.class: elementor-column elementor-col-66 elementor-top-column elementor-element elementor-element-1390d05 elementor-invisible

section.class: elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-a3e2b57 elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default

h4.a: Elevate Your Digital Strategy and Readiness ❯

img.alt: Connection lines around the Earth's surface, future technology backdrop with circles and lines.
Connection lines around the Earth's surface, future technology backdrop with circles and lines.

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-7097860 engineering-firms-home-dark elementor-hidden-tablet elementor-hidden-mobile elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading
elementor-element elementor-element-93ffe8c engineering-firms-home-dark elementor-hidden-desktop elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading

h4.a: Make Digital Readiness a Competitive Advantage ❯

img.alt: illustration of Isometric sustainable town with trees isolated on white background
illustration of Isometric sustainable town with trees isolated on white background

section.class: elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-7f25db1 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default

div.h2: Infrastructure Professionals Rely on Bentley Solutions

div.h4: In this project alone, Bentley software saved WSP approximately 40% of the overall structural design time. Literally, months of design time were saved.

section.class: elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-ca99757 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default
elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-726799e elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-min-height elementor-section-height-default

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-1012ffd elementor-star-rating--align-center elementor--star-style-star_fontawesome elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-star-rating

div.h6: Using Bentleys WaterGEMS, we are able to come up with the right design for our water system and we could maintain an affordable water supply, which we commit to provide in our concessionaire.

section.class: elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-c148eb8 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-min-height elementor-section-height-default

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-d595d90 elementor-star-rating--align-center elementor--star-style-star_fontawesome elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-star-rating

div.h6: Arup is committed to the adoption of BIM on its projects. ProjectWise is currently the best system to host BIM collaborative projects through the use of a common data environment.

section.class: elementor-section elementor-inner-section elementor-element elementor-element-2dde6d6 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-min-height elementor-section-height-default

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-8a12cb5 elementor-star-rating--align-center elementor--star-style-star_fontawesome elementor-invisible elementor-widget elementor-widget-star-rating

div.h6: STAAD revolutionized the structural design process years ago, and even today, many years and versions later, it is still the most user-friendly solution and preferred by most designers.

section.class: elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-eeeb682 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-min-height elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-items-middle
elementor-section elementor-top-section elementor-element elementor-element-ca9415d elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default

div.h6: Thousands of companies around the world utilize Bentley software. Here are just a few.

div.h4: The 2024 Year in Infrastructure and Going Digital Awards

p.strong: Nominate a project for the most prestigious awards in infrastructure!
Extended deadline to enter is April 29th.

function lazyLoadThumb(e,alt,l){var t='',a='';if(l){t=t.replace('data-lazy-','');t=t.replace('loading="lazy"','');t=t.replace(/.*?<\/noscript>/g,'');}t=t.replace('alt=""','alt="'+alt+'"');return t.replace("ID",e)+a}function lazyLoadYoutubeIframe(){var e=document.createElement("iframe"),t="ID?autoplay=1";t+=0===this.parentNode.dataset.query.length?"":"&"+this.parentNode.dataset.query;e.setAttribute("src",t.replace("ID",this.parentNode.dataset.src)),e.setAttribute("frameborder","0"),e.setAttribute("allowfullscreen","1"),e.setAttribute("allow","accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"),this.parentNode.parentNode.replaceChild(e,this.parentNode)}document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded",function(){var exclusions=[];var e,t,p,u,l,a=document.getElementsByClassName("rll-youtube-player");for(t=0;tu.includes(exclusion))),e.setAttribute("data-id",a[t].dataset.id),e.setAttribute("data-query",a[t].dataset.query),e.setAttribute("data-src",a[t].dataset.src),(e.innerHTML=lazyLoadThumb(a[t].dataset.id,a[t].dataset.alt,l)),a[t].appendChild(e),(p=e.querySelector(".play")),(p.onclick=lazyLoadYoutubeIframe)});
